Home.title: Let us pay tribute to the matriarch
Home.name: TENTCHOU
Home.subtitle: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.

fairePart.title: Announcement
fairePart.subtitle: Regretfully announce the passing of their daughter, mother, aunt, sister, wife, grandmother, and great-grandmother Mrs. Tentchou, born Nguegnang Anne, who passed away on 03.01.2025 in Douala after a long illness.
infosArray: The large Boukato Tchakoutio family in Bazou
The large Yongwouo family in Bazou
The large Mekep Tentchou Michel family in Douala
The large Welesandjon family in Douala
The large Miba Djokoua and Yomba family in Bazou
The children of the late Tchoumen Claude in Batchenga and Douala
The Nana Tentchou Paul family in Germany
The Fifen Tentchou Celestine family in Douala

fairePart.title: Announcement
infosArray: The Monthé Tentchou Caroline family in Ireland
The Tchemen Tentchou Beatrice family in Germany
The Njiké Tentchou Sidonie family in Douala
The Tchato Tentchou Guy family in Germany
The Koloko Tentchou Levis family in Germany
The Yomba Tentchou Germaine family in Germany

biographie.title: Biography
biographie.subtitle: Mrs. Tentchou, born Nguegnang Anne, born around 1941 in Bangoua to Djakoua and Yomba Marie. Leaves behind children and grandchildren.

programme.title: Program
programme.subtitle: Love one another, take care of one another, and remain steadfast in faith. "Do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand."

infosArray.title: Mon. 03.01 to 12 February 2025
infosArray.subtitle: Gathering at her home located on Nouvelle Route Grand-moulin.

infosArray.title: Thursday, 13 February 2025 at 12 PM
infosArray.subtitle: Viewing and removal of the body at Laquintinie Hospital

infosArray.title: 2 PM
infosArray.subtitle: Installation of the body at EEC Grand-moulin

infosArray.title: 4 PM
infosArray.subtitle: Vigil at her home in Grand-Moulin

infosArray.title: Fri. 14.02 February 2025 at midnight
infosArray.subtitle: Departure of the body for Djonlap neighborhood via Bazou

infosArray.title: 8 AM
infosArray.subtitle: Arrival and installation of the body in Djontap (Bazou) with a vigil

infosArray.title: Sat. 15.02 February 2025 at 9 AM
infosArray.subtitle: Arrival and installation of the family and guests

programme.title: Program
programme.subtitle: Regretfully announce the passing of their daughter, mother, aunt, sister, wife, grandmother, and great-grandmother Mrs. Tentchou, born Nguegnang Anne, who passed away on 03.01.2025 in Douala after a long illness.

infosArray.title: 11:30 AM
infosArray.subtitle: Interment in strict family privacy in Njontap
